abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Robert Lepage production of Wagner opera Siegfried, starring tenor Jay Hunter Morris in title role, at Metropolitan Opera.
snippet: Robert Lepage’s production of Wagner’s “Siegfried” opened Thursday night at the Metropolitan Opera with strong singing, remarkable playing and a creaky set.
lead_paragraph: Robert Lepage’s production of Wagner’s “Siegfried” opened Thursday night at the Metropolitan Opera with strong singing, remarkable playing and a creaky set.

headline.main: Dragon, Dwarfs and Demigod: It Must Be Wagner
headline.print_headline: Dragon, Dwarfs And Demigod: It Must Be Wagner
headline.seo: Metropolitan Opera’s ‘Siegfried’ Is Led by Impressive Singing
